plot: Lee Neville, the actor who played the Operator, and wrote and directed the 2010 Lee Neville Entertainment short film 'Not The Way It Feels', shares his vision for the project.
title: Not the Way It Feels: The Director's Vision
plot_es: Lee Neville, the actor who played the Operator, and wrote and directed the 2010 Lee Neville Entertainment short film 'Not The Way It Feels', shares his vision for the project.
original_name: Not the Way It Feels: The Director's Vision
plot_en: Lee Neville, the actor who played the Operator, and wrote and directed the 2010 Lee Neville Entertainment short film 'Not The Way It Feels', shares his vision for the project.
